org.spongepowered.api.boss

Interface ServerBossBar.Builder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResettableBuilder<ServerBossBar,ServerBossBar.Builder>
    Enclosing interface:
    ServerBossBar

    public static interface ServerBossBar.Builder
extends ResettableBuilder<ServerBossBar,ServerBossBar.Builder>
    Represents a builder class to create mutable ServerBossBars.
    See Also:
    BossBar, ServerBossBar

    • Method Summary
